sentences.sContent: From whom shall I get comfort?
sentences.sCn: 我从谁那儿能得到安慰呢?

sentences.sContent: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.sContent_eng: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.sCn: 当时的争论是围绕着派谁去好这一问题而进行的。
